formatName: Ogg Vorbis Codec Compressed Multimedia File
formatDescription: Ogg is a open container format maintained by the Xiph.Org Foundation. Vorbis is a free and open-source software project headed by the Xiph.Org Foundation and produces an audio coding format and software reference encoder/decoder (codec) for lossy audio compression.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Ogg Vorbis Codec Compressed Multimedia File
